original_text: And he spake a parable unto them, Can the blind lead the blind? shall they not both fall into the ditch?
korean_text: 또 비유로 말씀하시되 맹인이 맹인을 인도할 수 있느냐 둘이 다 구덩이에 빠지지 아니하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: And he spake a parable unto them
Can the blind lead the blind?
shall they not both fall into the ditch?
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 둘 다 도랑에 빠지지 않겠느냐?
